author: Stacey G
title: Another excellent stay at a London premier inn,lgood value for money.
text: Very clean, tidy and comfortable stay at a Central London premier Inn. Excellent location and a 5 minute walk to the tube. Great choice of food at breakfast, from cereal and toast to fruit, full English breakfast.
